title: (x) Adobe corporate face - Myriad {Stephen}
content:
Hi all,  
I think has been covered but I could not find it. What font(s) does Adobe use for “Creative Suite 2”?

[http://www.adobe.com/products/creativesuite/main.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20071030181316/http:/www.adobe.com/products/creativesuite/main.html "http://www.adobe.com/products/creativesuite/main.html")

Thanks.  
-Will

 [‹ (x) text face used in the TDC newsletter and annuals - Eplica {BJ}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071030181316/http:/www.typophile.com/node/14766 "Go to previous forum topic") [JELLO Font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071030181316/http:/www.typophile.com/node/14768 "Go to next forum topic")
author: winglets747
